mapper.select: SELECT ROWNUM NUM, P.PSN_CODE, P.PSN_NAME, G.ORG_NAME, T.CONTENT, C.CERT_NO, A.ACCT, S.SLAVE_ACCT, U.STATUS_CD FROM TB_USER_ROLE R, TB_USER U LEFT JOIN TB_ACCT A ON A.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND A.USER_ID = U.USER_ID LEFT JOIN TB_SLVACCT_ACCT_REF F ON F.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND F.ACCT_ID = A.ACCT_ID LEFT JOIN TB_SLAVE_ACCT S ON S.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND S.SLAVE_ACCT_ID = R.SLAVE_ACCT_ID, TB_PERSONNEL P LEFT JOIN TB_ORG_PSNDOC_REF F ON F.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND P.PERSONNEL_ID = F.PERSONNEL_ID LEFT JOIN TB_ORG G ON G.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND F.ORG_ID = G.ORG_ID LEFT JOIN TB_CERT C ON C.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND C.PERSONNEL_ID = P.PERSONNEL_ID LEFT JOIN TB_CONTACT T ON T.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND T.PERSONNEL_ID = P.PERSONNEL_ID WHERE R.USER_ID = U.USER_ID AND U.PERSONNEL_ID = P.PERSONNEL_ID AND R.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND U.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND P.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND R.ROLE_ID = #{roleId}
